lyric:
[01:09.83]We float before the sea at dusk
[01:11.91]In heavy mist, in glitter dust
[01:13.68]I smile before I want to
[01:16.15]I smile because you want to
[01:18.38]We sip the wind through lips of lust
[01:20.55]And out it comes, warm wisps of love
[01:22.78]I smile because I want to
[01:24.91]I smile because you want to
[01:27.33]Put the flowers in your hair
[01:29.51]Wrap your tendrils round my chest
[01:31.49]I smile because I want to
[01:34.38]I am your boy
[02:02.18]We float before the sea at dusk
[02:04.30]In heavy mist, in glitter dust
[02:06.28]I smile before I want to
[02:08.60]I smile because you want to
[02:10.83]We sip the wind through lips of lust
[02:13.05]And out it comes, warm wisps of love
[02:15.13]I smile because I want to
[02:17.25]I smile because you want to
[02:19.68]Put the flowers in your hair
[02:21.86]Wrap your tendrils round my chest
[02:23.89]I smile because I want to
[02:26.81]I am your boy
[02:37.20]Shake my little soul for you now, toy
[02:41.09]And I settle up into a world of noise
[02:45.50]I'm a man of many tricks and tools and joy
[02:49.80]With a battery of guilt on which to poise
[03:11.92]We float before the sea at dusk
[03:14.25]In heavy mist, in glitter dust
[03:16.22]I smile before I want to
[03:18.60]I smile because you want to
[03:20.72]We sip the wind through lips of lust
[03:22.96]And out it comes, warm wisps of love
[03:24.98]I smile because I want to
[03:27.00]I smile because you want to
[03:29.48]Put the flowers in your hair
[03:31.65]Wrap your tendrils round my chest
[03:33.75]I smile because I want to
[03:36.69]I am your boy
[04:04.50]Shake my little soul for you now, toy
[04:08.35]And I settle up into a world of noise
[04:12.74]I'm a man of many tricks and tools and joy
[04:17.10]With a battery of guilt on which to poise
[04:21.86]Shake my little soul for you now, toy
[04:25.86]And I settle up into a world of noise
[04:30.41]I'm a man of many tricks and tools and joy
[04:34.32]With a battery of guilt on which to poise
[05:14.29]Shake my little soul for you now, toy
[05:18.13]And I settle up into a world of noise
[05:22.54]I'm a man of many tricks and tools and joy
[05:26.94]With a battery of guilt on which to poise
tlyric:
[by:掩羽]
[01:09.83]日暮降临时我们在海上随波逐流
[01:11.91]在浓雾与耀眼的灰尘中
[01:13.68]我在我想要微笑之前微笑
[01:16.15]我代替不会微笑的你微笑
[01:18.38]我们在欲望的唇中啜饮微风
[01:20.55]直至一缕温暖爱意的到来
[01:22.78]我因我想要微笑而微笑
[01:24.91]我因你想要微笑而微笑
[01:27.33]在你发间放几朵花
[01:29.51]将你卷发缠绕在我胸间
[01:31.49]我因我想要微笑而微笑
[01:34.38]我是你的
[02:02.18]日暮降临时我们在海上随波逐流
[02:04.30]在浓雾与耀眼的灰尘中
[02:06.28]我在我想要微笑之前微笑
[02:08.60]我因我想要微笑而微笑
[02:10.83]我们在欲望的唇中啜饮微风
[02:13.05]直至一缕温暖爱意的到来
[02:15.13]我因我想要微笑而微笑
[02:17.25]我因你想要微笑而微笑
[02:19.68]在你发间放几朵花
[02:21.86]将你卷发缠绕在我胸间
[02:23.89]我因我想要微笑而微笑
[02:26.81]我是你的
[02:37.20]此刻为你颤抖我渺小的灵魂，玩物
[02:41.09]并了结于噪音的浪潮
[02:45.50]我满腹欢乐把戏
[02:49.80]又作愧疚姿态
